entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with wet snow late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
